name: Birding PNW (beta)
description:
Birding PNW is a smol, educational point-and-click, designed to encourage students headed into the field to open their senses. It is informed by my own experiences in environmental education. It is also meant to be a soul-nurturing and nutritious experience for any player.

Background Art - Jubilee @8pxl_

Bird Art - Rolita @rolitae_

Music, Programming, All Else - Nathan @nate_the_junco

insta @birdingpnw
